titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain mixture of fungicide.
To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain mixture of fungicide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on a mixture of fungicide containing Quinoxyfen (5,7-dichloro-4-(4-fluorophenoxy)) as the active ingredient and application adjuvants.
